meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kara Spak Brian Meacham Roger Craig Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6239.

td.p: Kara Spak, a newspaper reporter from Chicago, Illinois
Brian Meacham, a film preservationist originally from Anchorage, Alaska
Roger Craig, a computer scientist from Newark, Delaware

tr.td: I HAVE A PREPOSITION FOR YOU
2011 MOVIES
GOING TO PIECES
GROUP COUNTDOWN
THE LAST BATTLE
(Alex: You identify the war in which it occurred.)
THE NOBEL PEACE PRIZE

Brian
Kara

THEIR 4th TOP 40 HIT OF THE '60s

IT CAME FROM THE NEW WORLD
